popularityCurve.label: at oral argument the plaintiffs counsel suggested that the damages formula would be based upon the retail value of all the peanut butter sold during the class period or conagra's profits from peanut butter during the period

clusterList.phrase: at oral argument the plaintiffs counsel suggested that the damages formula would be based upon the retail value of all the peanut butter sold during the class period or conagra's profits from peanut butter during the period

although conagra has not formally admitted liability it is highly unlikely that it will deny that salmonella-contaminated peanut butter is a defective product and makes people sick who eat it the court is not convinced that an issues class would promote judicial economy or materially advance the litigation
